Title: GB-Telford: Highways Asset Management System
Description:
The procurement of a Highways Asset Management System for Borough of Telford & Wrekin, which includes:
•Integration with CRM
•GIS, Inventory and Asset Management 
•Capital and revenue programme 
•Highways Inspections 
•Insurance claims 
•Performance management / Quality Assurance 
•Finance / Budget Management 
•Data management, analysis and reporting

Title: GB-Shrewsbury: Street 3MC 002 - Works Permit System
Description:
The supply, implementation and hosting of an Integrated, fully compliant, Street Works EToN System for Shropshire Council for a period of 3 years commencing on the 1 June 2015.
 
The Street Works permit system willbe fully compliant with the latest EToN technical specification and be updated in line with any changes made by Department for Transport (“DfT”) or Highways And Utilities Committee (“HAUC”). 
The system shall be hosted on a secure server within the EEA that can be accessed via a web browser or similar from anywhere by the Authority.
